short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A daily companion in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Be Motivated and Informed with Everse. Everse is a powerful lightweight browser extension that gives you daily updates on Covid-19 stats, Local Weather, Inspirational daily Verses, and more, right in your browser Startpage.

Features:- 

* Daily Local Covid-19 Staus Widget
* Daily Inspirational verse Widget
* Daily Local Weather Widget
* Favorite Quick Links Widget
* Date and Time Widget
* Task / Todo Widget
* Searchbar for Googleing and goto URL
* Light & Dark mode

Updates:-

- Improved Startup Time 
- Added Onboarding for Local Personalization 
- Clean Improved UI
- Added Searchbar 
- Added Toast Notifications
- Added Theme
- Other Minor Fixes
